name: TOGETHER (itch) (GeekLatte, Daivy, Plyraxeus, David Dam, Vincent Loo Ji Jian, Daisy Chan, Squishyblob)
name_original: TOGETHER (itch) (GeekLatte, Daivy, Plyraxeus, David Dam, Vincent Loo Ji Jian, Daisy Chan, Squishyblob)
description:
[ Submission for Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 ]

Game Description

TOGETHER, is a physics-based platformer that centers around the goal of joining alphabet cubes together to form a word. 

A monument lies on top of a toy tower, marking an adventure where the player would travel around in search of cubes embedded with alphabet letters. Each letter has its own powers and it is the player’s goal to bring all the letters together to the monument.

Mechanics

In TOGETHER, there exist 6 different letter cubes (T, O, G, H, E, R). 

Each of these cubes have their own unique effect, altering the way the player control each of them. It is the player's goal to attempt to bring all the letters together.

                                                                                                                                                                        T for Tape O for Off G for Gravity E for Entity T for Tape H for Hook E for Entity R for Rebounce                                                                                                                                                          Credits Team MembersRoleContactDaisy ChanDirector, UI & UX Designer
